organizations but the key thing here is that I'm now in what I call a hybrid multi cloud environment I don't have a

when you think about the old model right you still see that firewall wrapped around the data center where's your
security perimeter on this slide it's the Internet so if you assume that your
security perimeter is the Internet you need to fundamentally rethink your whole and user security posture and that's
where we get to this concept that we see really resonating with a lot of
